meanings.definition: A stand or support for holding books.
meanings.sent1: I put my book on the bookstand to keep it safe.
meanings.sent2: The bookstand in the library had many shelves for books.
meanings.sent3: The bookstand and the books on it looked like a small book city.
meanings.sent4: Her love for reading was like a bookstand, always supporting her passion.
meanings.sent5: The bookstand stood tall, proud to hold the knowledge within its grasp.

meanings.definition: To place a book on a stand for display or reading.
meanings.sent1: She would bookstand her favorite novel to read it comfortably.
meanings.sent2: He bookstands his textbooks to study more effectively.
meanings.sent3: The magician bookstanded the book, making it float in the air.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to bookstand the book symbolized her commitment to finishing it.
meanings.sent5: The author would bookstand his latest work at the book fair for all to see.
